DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate , clinical stage T1b T2b ( AJCC 6th Edition , see Appendix II ) , NX/N0 , M0 . Karnofsky performance status > 80 . Patient must ≥ 18 year age . Gleason Sum < = 7 Prostatespecific antigen < = 20 ng/ml Patients must sign studyspecific inform consent form prior study entry .
